name:
Pinball Hall of Fame:
The Williams Collection
formal_name: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection
description:
On the 3DS, video pinball has been taken to the next level! The revolutionary 3D visual display shows off these Williams classics with tightened camera angles that maximize the immersive REAL PINBALL gameplay experience.

Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection is a compilation of seven of Williams’ greatest pinball machines. All tables are recreated and played in stunning 3D and presented as photo-realistically as possible. FarSight’s pinball physics and graphics have been hailed as the best pinball simulation ever.

Free play mode, Tournaments, Wizard goals, and the Williams Challenge are designed to be a rewarding experience for players of all skills. An in-depth tutorial is included for each table that teaches players the most important rules and skills needed to beat all the goals and become the ultimate Williams Pinball Wizard.
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
